```{r}
# Load ggplot2 library
library(ggplot2)

# Create a sample dataset
set.seed(123)
df <- data.frame(
  x = rnorm(100, mean = 5, sd = 2),
  y = rnorm(100, mean = 5, sd = 2),
  category = sample(c("A", "B"), 100, replace = TRUE),
  group = sample(letters[1:4], 100, replace = TRUE)
)

# Basic ggplot with various elements
p <- ggplot(df, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  
  # Add points
  geom_point(aes(color = category, shape = group), size = 3) +
  
  # Add a regression line
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, color = "black") +
  
  # Customize labels
  labs(title = "Scatter Plot with Various ggplot2 Elements",
       subtitle = "Illustration of ggplot2 syntax",
       x = "X Axis Label",
       y = "Y Axis Label",
       color = "Category",
       shape = "Group") +
  
  # Customize the theme
  theme_bw() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
    axis.title = element_text(face = "italic"),
    legend.position = "bottom"
  ) +
  
  # Add facets
  facet_wrap(~ category)

# Print the plot
print(p)

```
